text: Scott Edward Walker (born 5 March 1975) is a Scottish footballer who played for several clubs in Scotland and England, including St Mirren, Dunfermline Athletic and Hartlepool United. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1975 births Category:Footballers from Glasgow Category:Living people Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football central defenders Category:Dalry Thistle F.C. players Category:Kilmarnock F.C. players Category:Kilwinning Rangers F.C. players Category:East Stirlingshire F.C. players Category:St Mirren F.C. players Category:Dunfermline Athletic F.C. players Category:Alloa Athletic F.C. players Category:Brechin City F.C. players Category:Hartlepool United F.C. players Category:Ayr United F.C. players Category:Linlithgow Rose F.C. players Category:Scottish Premier League players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players Category:Scottish Junior Football Association players
title: Scott Walker (footballer)
